My Projects

Tweet map

Performed Sentiment Analysis on tweets extracted from twitters real time feed .Built a scalable cloud application using Python flask and the Amazon Web Services components - elastic beanstalk,sqs and sns

Recommendation System

Used the yelp Dataset to predict business ratings .The implementation was done using python pandas and a hybrid approach is used alongwith dimen- sionality reduction techniques to improve efficiency. Wrote a paper titled -Predicting business Successfulness using Predictive data analytics . based on this project which is published in the IJCA journal

Questionnaire Application

Team Project at college . Developed a Questionnaire System consisting of both offline and online android apps and a Web Application in web2py(A python based web Framework).

Procedural Content generation

Worked on rendering fractal objects using iterated function systems in Java. Built a two dimensional iterated function systems generator to procedurally render images
